Name: Queen
Description: The murder happened several weeks after the implementation of the so-called Anti-Gay-Bill in Uganda. Queen, a trans sex worker, has been attacked by a guy, whom her friends believe she met at a bar. During the attack she called her friends by phone saying “the guy is beating me the guy is killing me.” She was found later by her friends with severe wounds and signs of torture (cuts from a bottle on her body and in her anus). Queen was hospitalized and died several days later."

Name: Jade Esmeralda
Description:
Jade was shot by a police detective, who wanted to underpay her for services. When she didn't agree, he killed her inside his car.

In September 2014 José Suárez Vásquez, 33, was sentenced to 9 years in prison for intentional homicide and misuse of a regulation weapon.
